agent.body: <p>Happy to be associated with such a world class organization as HK Lane . I am very excited about the energy and diligence I bring to this fine establishment . I look forward to working with all my team members now and in the future . I enjoy hiking and swimming along with playing some golf when possible . I grew up on the east coast and bring with that, deep loyalty and core principles. The business of real estate is complex and always changing ,situations I thrive to work in .</p>

agent.agentdailyemailheader: As 55+ Active Adult specialists the Billy D Lewis Team of Realtors looks forward to being of assistance to you and helping you with all your Real Estate Needs. The active adult communities are the best values in the desert for price, amenities and social life. Contact us and let us provide you tours of one or more of these communities.

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>License # 01246066</p>
<p>License #01301880</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 18px;">&quot;I make sure we trust one another, now and in the future. &nbsp;We&#39;re a team!&quot;</span></p>

agent.body:
<p>Reasons to choose me as your Real Estate Agent: Honesty, Integrity, Knowledge and the most important reason: I understand that this is all about You and Your needs, Your wants and Your investment.</p>
<div>You can be assured that I will work very hard to achieve those goals &amp; your trust.&nbsp; Residential and residential income properties are my primary focus in the areas of Indian Wells, Palm Desert, La Quinta and Rancho Mirage. Serving my clients in a professional and ethical manner, listening to, and fulfilling their needs are all my goals.</div>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px;">&quot;My greatest moment in the real estate process is when I can hand my clients their keys and say, Welcome Home!&quot;</span></p>

agent.body: <p>License # 01993931</p>

<p>Danita is committed to Excellence and Service. Specializes in Country Club Estates, creative problem solver and a member of the National Association of Realtors. Danita has over 10 years sales experience with numerous sales awards.</p>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: georgia, serif;"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong>For 13 years, I was the hostess of &quot;Real Estate Showcase!&quot;</strong></span></span></p>

agent.body: <p>Diane Flaherty is of the top agents of HK Lane . She specializes in country club/golf couse, luxury homes and condos in Bermuda Dunes, La Quinta, Palm Desert, Indian Wells and Rancho Mirage. A low handicap golfer who has been playing in the Palm Springs area for over 25 years, her vast experience could be invaluable in helping you find just the right home, country club and golf course. Former club Champion at four country clubs and winner of the Women&#39;s Golf Association of Northern California Championship. Member of Bermuda Dunes Country Club.&nbsp;<br /> Honesty, integrity and a zest for life are just a few qualities this dynamic individual possesses.</p>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 20px;"><strong>TRUST ME TO DELIVER YOUR EXPECTATIONS!</strong></span></p>

<p>In today&#39;s challenging market, I AM YOUR GUY!&nbsp; Read my profile and see why!</p>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong>&quot;Adding Value to People and Communities&quot;</strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong>&quot;I am a good listener and pride myself in always being responsive!&quot;</strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 24px;"><strong>&quot;My clients are my most valuable properties!&quot;</strong></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: tahoma, geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong>&quot;YOUR TOTAL SATISFACTION IS MY FIRST PRIORITY!&quot;</strong></span></span></p>
<p>&quot;I try to treat people the way THEY want to be treated- not how I want to be treated&quot;</p>

<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong>&quot;My desire is to give, in order to receive. &nbsp;The more you give of yourself, the more you will get back in return.&quot;</strong></span></p>

agent.body: <p>License # 01424971</p>

<p>My husband and I have been working in Real Estate here in the 55+ communities for the past 6 years. Our team is in the top 10% of Realtors in this Valley. We are looking forward to being of service to buyers, sellers or renters, to meet and exceed their expectations for quality Real Estate service. Our years of highly successful professional sales and negotiating experience, allows us to be immediately effective on your behalf in all transactions. We look forward to making it possible for you to reach your objectives; whatever your Real Estate needs, We Will Make It Happen!</p>
<p>License # 01819613</p>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong>&quot;Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.&quot; - Albert Einstein</strong></span></p>
<p>License # 01944581</p>

agent.body: <p>Kim who was born in Thailand, was a graduate in fashion design and worked in the garment industry for over 20 years. Her real estate career began in 1996 in the South Bay area of Southern California. She is an accomplished painter and sculpture. She is an avid golfer, swimmer and in her free time Kim volunteers in the care of others.&nbsp;</p>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong>In today&#39;s real estate market there is simply no substitute for a good Realtor!</strong></span></p>

agent.body: <p>Good day.I&#39;ve been in real estate since 1993. I started my career in Orange County where I&#39;m originally from. I moved here in 2001. For four years I was a branch manager for one of the Prudential offices here in the valley.I currently work with a great group if individuals with HK Lane Real Estate.My philosophy has always been to treat the client with the utmost of respect and to make them know I will do whatever it takes to guide them through the real estate process as painlessly as possible. I want my clients to know that I want them as a &quot;client for life&quot;and I&#39;ll do whatever it takes to assist them now and in the future.&nbsp;</p>

agent.head: <p>License# 01851948</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px;">&quot;I offer Service, Service, Service and my&nbsp;many satisfied clients agree!&quot;</span></strong></p>

<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong>&quot;A successful media interview only lasts for a moment, whereas, the outcome of our collaborating together in finding your dream home will be a thrill that can last a lifetime.&quot;</strong></span></p>

<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: tahoma, geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12px;"><strong>&quot;In all of my pursuits, I utilize the positive attitude, creativity, knowledge and tenacity&nbsp;</strong></span><strong>to serve my clients well.&quot;</strong></span></p>
<p>License #01024826</p>

<p><span style="font-size: 14px;"><strong>&quot;I am committed to excellence and dedicated to the success of my client&quot;</strong></span></p>

<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: tahoma, geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong>&quot;BE A PART OF THE CUTTING EDGE&quot;</strong></span></span></p>

agent.body: <p>Tish Miller&nbsp;is a&nbsp;long-time desert resident and entered into real estate in 1980.&nbsp; She provides&nbsp;her clients with experience, hard work, integrity and fearless dedication. Tish is primarily focused on the beautiful community of Morongo Valley where&nbsp;she lives and works. She has been a top selling agent in that territory since the beginning of her real estate career.&nbsp; As an&nbsp;active member of the Chamber of Commerce, the Morongo Valley Trail Riders Association,&nbsp;Tish is very knowledgeable about buying and selling in&nbsp;her rural community and throughout the desert area.&nbsp; Her goal is to give 100% service, 100% of the time.</p>

agent.head: <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong>&quot;I don&#39;t sell houses - I show houses! &nbsp;If I sold you a house and you were unhappy with it, you&#39;d be unhappy with me and I want to make sure you&#39;re happy with your choice.&quot;</strong></span></p>

<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16px;">&quot;Success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration! </span>&nbsp;</strong><strong style="line-height: 1.6em; font-size: 16px;">I think outside the box, communicate effectively, and work hard!&quot;</strong></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
